Author: PacificK2A#4591
Content: Hello, I'm try to sign an offline Komodo transaction using the wallet AGMA Windows-v0.5.7-4. I'm following the instructions at this link, https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000026631-sign-transactions-offline-and-broadcast-online-using-agama

Author: PacificK2A#4591
Content:
Everything works fine until I try to broadcast the transaction. I get the error, {"code":1,"message":"the transaction was rejected by network rules.

64: scriptpubkey
[]"}. Any ideas what is wrong ? Thank you

Author: PacificK2A#4591
Content:
I also tried to broadcast the same signed transaction at https://kmdexplorer.io/tx/send where I got the error, An error occured:
64: scriptpubkey. Code:-26

Author: PacificK2A#4591
Content: What is the latest Agama version ? Is it a portable version (so I don't need to install it) ?

Author: ùôäùôûùô£ùô†#3612
Content: It's in such a sense portable that the program holds all it needs to run in the extracted folder. The settings, wallet.dat and chaindata are standard written to %AppData% (windows) or comparable locations in Linux & MacOS

Author: PacificK2A#4591
Content: OK, thanks. Its no longer called Agama, so that threw me off the trail. I will try it. Thanks again !

Author: PacificK2A#4591
Content: I am now running the new Versuscoin wallet Versus Desktop v0.0.4-alpha. I do not see anyway to generate an transaction for offline signing, like the Agama wallet had. How can I generate and then sign a transaction offline on a 2nd computer in the new Versus wallet ?

Author: PacificK2A#4591
Content: Forget it. I think I need to use the 2nd wallet on the page called the graphical wallet v0.6.0-6. I will try that one.

Author: wingless#8440
Content: @pbca26  just a follow up question... the only wallet that supports KMD and Trezor is the Magnum wallet. Correct? And when I want to claim my rewards, I use the link you posted earlier, right?

Author: PacificK2A#4591
Content: It worked. I confirm for you that the offline signing of a transaction and then broadcasting online worked successfully with Agama-Windows-v0.6.0-6. Thanks again for the help !
